thread.title: Nicholas Farrah
thread.title_full: Gardner-White Furniture reviewed by Nicholas Farrah

author: Nicholas Farrah
title: Nicholas Farrah
text: Donna and David were very knowledgeable about the products in the store and helped us make the right choice for our home. We were able to peruse at our leisure and never felt pressured into making a purchase. The delivery team was also great and made sure the furniture was how and where we wanted it. We definitely plan on shopping here in the future!
